openingText: You are awakened by the familiar sound of the pod door opening. Dull, vaguely pinkish light and temperate air waft in. The ship emits a cheerful tone and a large envelope emerges from a slot in the ceiling and lands in a wire basket.

gameRooms.name: Rocket Pod Bridge
gameRooms.description: The inside of the rocket pod's bridge is cramped, even with both seats, sofas, and televisions removed. The aft of the pod is crammed full with packages, all bound together by a thick web of nano-carbo belts. The pod door is open.

interactiveObjects.name: PlanEx Mailer
interactiveObjects.description: There is a PlanEx Standard Mailer here.

objectActions.verbiage: This is an officially-branded Planet Express Standard Mailer in the stately green and beige livery of the galaxy's finest delivery service. Capable of enduring forces up to one G and temperatures as low as Absolute Room Temperature, the PlanEx Standard Mailer is the standard-of-the art in delivery technology.

gameRooms.name: Landing Platform
gameRooms.description: This is basically just the roof of a building, though there are a number of very serious-looking notices regarding authorized parking. The air is still. The surrounding city squats quietly in the morning light, blanketed in a heavy pink mist. The PlanEx Rocket Delivery Pod is here, shiny and green, its pod door open invitingly. There is a stairwell access door to the south.

interactiveObjects.name: terminal
interactiveObjects.description: You see a computer terminal set into the wall by the door.

objectActions.verbiage: The small screen of the terminal is dusty and dark. It looks like the power is off.
The terminal screen flickers on and shows the result of a brief start-up check: 'FAILED. This terminal is out of order. Contact your systems administrator for help.'
The words 'ERROR No. 584: OUT OF ORDER' blink on the screen.
The terminal shuts down, now exactly as useful as it was when it was on.

gameRooms.name: Stairwell Top
gameRooms.description: The top of a stairwell. The stairs descend from here. To the north, natural light streams in through an open door marked 'EXIT.'

gameRooms.name: Lower Stairwell
gameRooms.description: The stairwell is lit in dim green light, courtesy of barely glowing strips set into the concrete walls. Downstairs there loos to be a door and a landing. It seems a lot brighter upstairs.

gameRooms.name: Landing
gameRooms.description: A floor landing in the stairwell. Like the rest of the stairwell, it is dim and green. To the north of the landing is a steel door marked '4.' The stairs lead up, but the stairs down are impassably choked with rubble.
